about_the_game: Want to get behind the wheel in the latest SUPER BATTLE POLYCARS experience? Power your way through our offline tutorials to get the hang of things before the official release!
detailed_description: Want to get behind the wheel in the latest SUPER BATTLE POLYCARS experience? Power your way through our offline tutorials to get the hang of things before the official release!
ext_user_account_notice: Epic Games (Supports Linking to Steam Account)
name: SUPER BATTLE POLYCARS Demo
short_description: Hop into the driver's seat in an old-school vehicle combat game with a modern twist! Fight for victory alongside your teammates in our Massive Online Vehicle Arena to put your team driving skills to the test or fight for glory in Deathmatch! DRIVE the fastest, DESTROY the competition, and DOMINATE.
supported_languages: English, German, Japanese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
